entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
